revision.text:
clearscope bool '''CountsAsKill''' () const
==Usage== Checks for whether the calling actor is {{Flag|COUNTKILL|countable as a kill}} or not.
===Return value=== Returns ''true'' if the calling actor is countable as a kill and is not {{Flag|FRIENDLY|friendly}}, otherwise it returns ''false''.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
